title: Has anyone gotten to level 3 honor yet!!
body: Ok so I'm fairly consistently getting honored and haven't been punished for and bad behavior, or be leaverbusted but i am still at lv 2 honor. Is anyone else having similar problems?

replies.body: It certainly feels like it might be taking awhile for people to rank up in honor levels, but keep in mind the ranks range from 0-5 and you're meant to rank up throughout the season. It wouldn't feel too good if we were able to rank up after only a few matches, and everyone was at Honor 5 without anywhere to go from there. Keep at it, and we should start seeing those Honor Rank 3 peeps soon!

Yes, I got honor level 3.
Fyi the loading screen flair doesn't show up every game simply because you're honor 3. It only shows up if you were honored the game before.

So if you lose lane hard and feed and no one wants to honor you, you don't get the flair next game. Or if one person carries your team and everyone honors them, you don't get the flair next game. You just have to get one honor (premades honoring you would be cheap so you would have to get 2 honors from premades).

I didn't know this until I reviewed honor when I hit level 3, so I thought I'd share in case anyone else didn't thoroughly read through :p

I received honor 3 two days ago, Keeping this thread updated because I want to see if anyone has hit honor 4, or at least an update on when they get it. I believe that the honor system has a daily limit, like most things in LoL. That means that if you play x amount of games such as a win per day and maybe 5 honors a day you max out for the day in gaining honor to the next rank. I believe this because I have been trying to climb out of bronze and I have been getting a lot of honor but it wasn't until i saw someone who got honor three that I logged back in and got honor 3.  I may be completely wrong but it was my next log in that tipped me off that it might have a max cap per day.
